content.en: Optimizing job scheduling: Researchers have been exploring the use of deep reinforcement learning algorithms to address various challenges in job shop scheduling. These algorithms, such as Deep Q-network (DQN) and Deep reinforcement learning (DRL), are proposed as solutions to improve the performance and efficiency of scheduling processes. By applying these algorithms, researchers aim to optimize scheduling in dynamic and flexible job shop environments, where new job insertions, uncertain events, and limited resources are common.
content.da: Optimering af jobplanlægning: Forskere har udforsket brugen af dybe forstærkningslæringsalgoritmer for at tackle forskellige udfordringer i job shop-planlægning. Disse algoritmer, såsom Deep Q-netværk (DQN) og dyb forstærkningslæring (DRL), foreslås som løsninger til at forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten af planlægningsprocesser. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskere mod at optimere planlægningen i dynamiske og fleksible job shop-miljøer, hvor nye jobindsættelser, usikre hændelser og begrænsede ressourcer er almindelige.
